title: If mice lack an enzyme essential to the process...

content.question: If mice lack an enzyme essential to the process of long-term potentiation, which of the following will be the most likely consequence?

choices.label: They will be unable to learn a maze.
They will learn a maze only through observational learning.
They will learn a maze only through classical conditioning.
They will learn a maze only through positive reinforcement.

content.answer: They will be unable to learn a maze.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
